section.title: Downloading and installing SConsGnuPackage
section.para:
You may download and unpack source tarball
user@host:$ cd /tmp user@host:$ wget https://github.com/ptomulik/scons-gnu-package/tarball/master -O scons-gnu-package.tar.gz user@host:$ tar -xzf scons-gnu-package.tar.gz
or clone the source from repository
user@host:$ cd /tmp user@host:$ git clone git://github.com/ptomulik/scons-gnu-package.git

To install SConsGnuPackage locally in your project, simply copy the directory SConsGnuPackage into your project's site_scons/ directory.
user@host:$ cp -r /tmp/*scons-gnu-package*/SConsGnuPackage myproj/site_scons/
Download and install additional packages that SConsGnuPackage depends on. The list of dependencies and installation procedure is described in README.md.
